## Sleeve.getSleeveBladeburnerEstimatedSuccessChance() method

Get estimate success chance of a Bladeburner action for the sleeve.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getSleeveBladeburnerEstimatedSuccessChance(sleeveNumber: number, action: string, contract?: string): number[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  sleeveNumber | number | Index of the sleeve. |
|  action | string | Name of the action to be performed. |
|  contract | string | _(Optional)_ Name of the contract if applicable. |

**Returns:**

number\[\]

Estimated success chance for the specified action.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 4 GB

Returns an array with two values, from 0 to 1, representing minimum and maximum success chance.
